welcome_message_body: Welcome to Maseru, the charming capital city of Lesotho! Known for its stunning mountainous landscape and vibrant cultural scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Renaissance Cafe
restaurants.description: Renaissance Cafe is a café located in Maseru.

restaurants.name: Piri Piri Cozinha Portuguêsa
restaurants.description: Piri Piri Cozinha Portuguêsa is a portuguese restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Lancer's Inn
restaurants.description: Lancer's Inn is a steakhouse located in Maseru.

restaurants.name: No. 7 Restaurant
restaurants.description: No. 7 Restaurant is a breakfast spot located in Maseru.

restaurants.name: Regal Restaurant
restaurants.description: Regal Restaurant is a indian restaurant located in Maseru.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Moshoeshoe International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Moshoeshoe International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sehonghong Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sehonghong Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
